localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: With Upvoty, you can easily collect and manage all of your customer's feedback. Share your roadmap and communicate updates with the Changelog. Now, all available in Dark mode! 🖤
blogPost.body: With Upvoty, you can easily collect and manage all of your customer's feedback. Share your roadmap and communicate updates with the Changelog. Now, all available in Dark mode! 🖤
blogPost.title: Upvoty Dark Mode - User feedback, roadmap, and changelog in dark mode 🖤
blogPost.author: Mike

localize.description: 使用Upvoty，您可以轻松收集和管理所有客户的反馈。分享您的路线图，并通过变更日志沟通更新。现在，所有这些都可以在黑暗模式下使用 🖤
localize.tagline: 黑暗模式下的用户反馈、路线图和变更日志 🖤。

localize.description: 使用Upvoty，您可以輕鬆收集和管理所有客戶的反饋。分享您的路線圖，並通過變更日誌溝通更新。現在，所有這些都可以在黑暗模式下使用 🖤
localize.tagline: 黑暗模式下的用戶反饋、路線圖和變更日誌 🖤。

previous.excerpt: With hydesk, we want to allow people to be more flexible within their workspace. You can use it while sitting to have the perfect viewing height for any screen or just standing up to boost your creativity and well-being.
previous.title: hydesk - A fully foldable and sustainable stand-up desk

localize.description: 通过hydesk，我们希望让人们在工作空间中更加灵活。您可以在坐着的时候使用它，为任何屏幕提供完美的观看高度，也可以站着使用，以提高您的创造力和幸福感。
localize.tagline: 一张可折叠、可持续发展的站立式办公桌

localize.description: 通過hydesk，我們希望讓人們在工作空間中更加靈活。您可以在坐着的時候使用它，爲任何屏幕提供完美的觀看高度，也可以站着使用，以提高您的創造力和幸福感。
localize.tagline: 一張可摺疊、可持續發展的站立式辦公桌
